article_title: Dia del Campesino events serves area's farm workers on Saturday
article_text:

og.description: SAN LUIS, Ariz. – Before they board labor buses that will take them to the fields early Saturday morning, farm workers from the Yuma area and Mexico will be able to gather in a city park here for an event in their honor.
og.title: Dia del Campesino events serves area's farm workers on Saturday
